td.content: s:patient presents with severe fatigue, Respiratory x 2 weeks. pt also reports chronic severe fever. she is a 45 yr old white female film director. she is a chronic alcoholic she has been a chronic smoker for the last 5 years o:Height 59 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, mild rhonchi, HEENT: WNL, wheeze-BIL a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

td.content: s:pt describes severe fever, severe fatigue and Respiratory. she is a white F aged 45 years. she has been a chronic smoker for the last 4 years patient has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption o:Height 59 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, mild rhonchi, HEENT: WNL, wheeze-BIL a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Tube thoracostomy - pleural cavity.

td.content: s:pt presents with Neurological. pt is a F film director aged 45 years. o:Height 59 in, Weight 117 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Paralysis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to neurology.

s:pt presents with 5 days history of worsening Neurological. she is a white f film director aged 45 yrs. she smokes one pack a day she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 3 years o:Height 59 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Paralysis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered B burgdorferi IgM CSF.

s:pt presents with 8 days history of severe fatigue and severe fever. pt is a 46 YO female. she smokes 1 pack/day for 3 years consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily o:Height 59 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, mild rhonchi, HEENT: WNL, wheeze-BIL a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.

td.content: s:patient presents with severe fever and severe fatigue for past 12 days. pt is a 46 yr old white female. she smokes one pack/day of cigarettes she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 2 years o:Height 59 in, Weight 118 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16, mild rhonchi, HEENT: WNL, wheeze-BIL a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ethambutol - 400 mg oral, Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, Pyrazinamide - 15 mg/kg oral, Rifampin - 10 mg/kg oral, and ordered lobectomy - left lobe of lung.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination
